instrument_status.comment: MWS washed , double NaOH washed sample lanes
MWS washed , NaOH washed sample lanes
MWS + water volumes were ok, bottles changed
comms issue now resolved. All spec tests complete post move. Ready to go back up
Communications issue during move. Will not initialise
HCS temporary files now saving at Sanger default locations (D:\Runs and E:\Runs).
Both positions are saving runs to the illumina temp fies, agter its upgrade (like hs40)
Software updated to latest version - HCS2.2.68
Please can this be upgraded to the latest software.
NaOH wash new gaskets primed ok
NaOH wash performed all volumes were ok
NaOH washed all volumes ok. pav/tkb
FCA temp found to be 3 degree higher than FCB. Calibrated FCA to correct temp.
Still poorer region of quality tiles at same place on FCA. Seems to always drop away just before cycle 40, like in previous runs. FCB looks noticebale better in comparison
Same issue seen as reported 29.1.15. Poorer quality data/clusters on same region of the flowcell
NaOH washed , all volumes ok. New gaskets fitted.
Completed full PM. Corrected uniformity issue and someother minor adjustments. All tests in spec.
Uniformity/line centering check? - poorer quality data/clusters, on left hand side of tiles
NaOH wash performed all volumes were ok
Peltiers checked; OK. R2 also has even intensities. Suspect problem may be with cBot rather than HiSeq. Will check cBot1 (MB)
Can rear peltier be checked, as there is a poorer quality region across lanes over tiles 1-6( run14489)
NaOH wash performed all volumes were ok
NaOH wash new gaskets primes ok
New front manifold and new springs fitted to front manifold mount. Bubbles occur at usual expected level usung water. Please monitor when priming reagents etc.
Instrument running. Assessing data from first few cycles. So far looks to have minimal impact on run. Will assess over the weekend and make final decision.
Continual air bubbles an both flowcells in all lanes. Any runs loaded would fail
FCB manifold cleaned and repair, fluidics check. Good flow restored.
automatic status update : initial new instrument status
